description: Fennel, apple and horseradish give this smoked salmon rye toast Scandinavian flavour.
name: Smoked Salmon & Horseradish Rye Toasts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 large granny smith apple, cored and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the apple and fennel with a mandolin, if possible. Place in a bowl and cover with ice cold water. Leave to sit for 10 minutes, drain well, add a teaspoon of lemon juice to the bowl and toss to coat.
Mix the creme fraiche, remaining lemon juice and horseradish cream in a small bowl.
Toast the rye bread. Place a tablespoon of horseradish sauce on each slice, top with smoked salmon, fennel and apple salad and fresh dill and serve.
